How many appointments do I have on May 15th, 2024? Please give me a summary of the description for each appointment.
I need to find out the appointments for May 15th, 2024. The function `get_day_calendar_events` seems to be the most relevant for this task, as it returns the appointments for a given day.

<function-thoughts>I have received the result of the `get_day_calendar_events` function call. It seems that I have three appointments on May 15th, 2024.</function-thoughts>

<answer>You have three appointments on May 15th, 2024. The first appointment is a Team Sync at 10:00 AM in Conference Room B, where you will discuss project updates and roadblocks with your team. The second appointment is a lunch meeting with Sarah at 12:30 PM at Central Park Cafe. The third appointment is an Introductory meeting with clients at 3:00 PM in Meeting Room 2 to discuss potential collaboration opportunities.</answer>
